code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Profile=()=>{const[data,setData]=useState({books:[],reviews:[]});useEffect(()=>{const fetchProfile=async()=>{try{const token=localStorage.getItem("token");const res=await axios.get("/api/profile",{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});setData(res.data);}catch(err){console.error(err);}};fetchProfile();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"My Profile"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-semibold mt-4",children:"My Books"}),data.books.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No books added yet."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list-disc ml-6",children:data.books.map(book=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[book.title," - ",book.author]},book._id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-semibold mt-4",children:"My Reviews"}),data.reviews.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No reviews yet."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list-disc ml-6",children:data.reviews.map(review=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:[review.bookId.title,":"]})," ",review.reviewText," (",review.rating,"\u2B50)"]},review._id))})]});};export default Profile;
